Christmas and New Year Opening Hours

Dec 21, 2016
Naomi Liddle

Tags: opening-hours ,  christmas ,  new-year ,  2016 ,  2017

During the upcoming holiday period SARDâ€™s live user and technical support will be available as follows:

Friday 23 DecemberOpen as usual
Saturday 24 December (Christmas Eve)Closed
Sunday 25 December (Christmas Day)Closed
Monday 26 December (Boxing Day)Closed
Tuesday 27 December (Christmas Bank Holiday)Closed
Wednesday 28 DecemberFull user and technical support
Thursday 29 DecemberFull user and technical support
Friday 30 DecemberFull user and technical support
Saturday 31 December (New Years Eve)Closed
Sunday 1 January (New Year's Day)Closed
Monday 2 January (New Year's Holiday)Closed
Tuesday 3 JanuaryOpen as usual

We would like to take this opportunity to wish all of our users a merry and restful Christmas and a very happy 2017.
